name: [IN]FAMOUS
description:
You're known. Renowned. Loved. Feared. Wanted.

Scarred.

Infamous.

Prestige Rules for Esoteric Enterprises

This splat is made as a small expansion to Emily Allen's Esoteric Enterprises, which can be found here.

It contains rules for prestige classes, powerful alternative levels characters can opt in once they meet certain conditions, and become a big enough deal within the Occult Underground.

These classes include:

  • Chaos Warriors - Heralds of entropy and change who fight tooth and nail against all laws, be they those of man or reality itself.
  • Painted Ladies - Enigmatic skin-witches who use their flesh as a living scroll to cast spells in strange ways.
  • Sacrifices - Victims of dangerous occult rituals, barely saved, stuck between their own form and that which was summoned. 
  • Spin Doctors - Masters of manipulation and underground political warfare weaving webs of intrigue through the underground.
  • Urban Legends - Wretched creatures cursed with a fickle form by the power of tales and rumours.

And to help round out these classes, you will also find rules for Chaos Coalitions as a new underground faction, as well as extended rules for generating the life of a rumour.
